DYLAN.raw_line: Don't need this anymore.But I sure could use this.Damn I hate to fly.Charlie will be joining us, won't he?Hi. Hi. Okay. I'll be right in.Not him. Not him, not him, not him.Oh God no.It's a mistake. A horrible, horrible mistake.Here here.Your boyfriend thinks you're a secretary.It's good to be him.We're on it.I drive too fast. Look who's talking.Three double doubles, animal style. Fries. Three chocolate shakes.Alright, we'll hit the reception tonight. I only wish we had a clue to go on.Sorry.Sweet. Now we've got someone to look for.The average investor sees technology stocks as discrete entities, "This one is up 50 points, this one is down 10." It's only through derivative analysis that one sees the real power of that sector.Well, there are so many options. I mean, who can say what the one best choice is?For my money, Keppler-Wilson is a strong choice.Thanks.He's cute.Sixty-five percent of relationships begin in the workplace.Why don't you get some more?Ask him out. Ask him out.Pardon me.Natalie. Nine o'clock. Thin man.You call it.Copy.Excuse me?Excuse me, do you know which way the ladies' room is?Why do they always run?He's going down.Where's the challenge in that?503? That's not local, where is it?Eyes on the prize, Nat. We gotta tap the phones.I think that can be arranged.Three shots of tequila, please. And one Tom Collins.Ooh, that is an enticing offer. But I got a better idea. How about a shot contest? My treat?Okay, I'll take that as a yes. Bartender? Bring ten shots of tequila over to my table. And keep em coming.Hey, I've got an idea. Now let's have a chair throwing contest.Chair throwing? Never heard of it? You just pick up your chair and throw it as far as you can.Guten Tag!Guten Nacht!This way.We were expecting that.Right!There!Where are we?Yes. Except for the bobsled run, and the backwards part, it's going exactly according to plan.I think we're in the clear.Or maybe not.What is it?Ouch.Call him, he'll totally understand.He will so give you the second chance.Hello, I saw the way he looked at you.Well done.Cocktail?I think that earns us a vacation.Absolutely. But we'd all feel safer if you could join us, Charlie.We're good.I've got surveillance on all the windows. Don't answer the door, don't answer the phone.Also, stay away from the windows.Lucky for us.This is a panic button. Press it and one of us can be here in ten minutes.Whoever's closest.What?I can't Mr. Knox. I'm sorry. If you...Don't be.That's you, hunh? Cute kid. Cute family.Oh. Oh, I'm sorry. I had no idea...But...?Wow. That's a lot for a kid to live with.Boy did I have you pegged wrong.Well, to be honest, I thought you were a rich kid who inherited everything. But that's pretty typical. I've got instincts for the job, but when it comes to men? Well...Oh. Well, you ARE, so...No. But I...I shouldn't.No. I shouldn't.Thank you for dinner, Mr. Knox. And lock the door behind me.I'm on it.It sounds like fun.We need someone's help.Champagne, please. Your best.Where you off to, Bos?Um... well...So what, so I like him. Is that so wrong?WAS a client. We finished the job.Uh, guys? GUYS!I'm a big girl. I make my own decisions. I'm going out with him.Where's that music coming from?Oh... Oh wow.That's amazing.Maybe.Well, I don't know what he looks like, but I feel like I know him. We all do.Nope.Of course, but believe me, it's impossible. I've tried. Let's not talk about Charlie, okay? Or work.In fact, let's not talk at all.Eric, it's Vivian.Want me to tell her to come back, or...Hello?Oh no. OH SHIT. Natalie, she's HERE!I'm at Knox's, she just showed up!I can't do that. Call Alex and meet me here.Oh, I'm watching it. In fact, I just called for back up.I'm not much for games.All this time, we thought Red Star was behind this, but it was you. You faked your kidnapping.Why?Oh, well, in that case I feel a lot better about you being a lying pole smoker.I can't believe I trusted you.I can't believe Knox tried to kill me. I mean, I've been lied to, I've been cheated on, but no guy has ever tried to SHOOT me before. I'm gonna get him for that.And now, thanks to us, he's had hours to download whatever top secret information he wants, for God knows what reason.Don't! He's alive, he's gotta be. If... What IS that?Can we trace him?He could be anywhere in North America.What, pudding?Oh yeah? And I suppose you could do better?Oh, right.So tell me, Knox, what's the brilliant plan? You gonna sell a list of our foreign spies to the highest bidder? Blackmail the President?Revenge? Against who?Seems like you're going a bit overboard.I don't know why you bother. I've already won.Every moment I sit here is a moment I'm using to figure out how to take you down. In fact, this statement -- this one I'm making right here-- is just me stalling for time while I decide which of your goons I'm going to flatten first. It's gonna be the guy behind me.By the time your guys are firing, I'll be at about 180 on my reverse inverted 360, which will land me on Fat Boy there, as promised. He'll take the chair seat in the chin. Now... I'm warning both of you: I'm going to get you to shoot each other. I know. Cliche as that sounds. Last, you guys -- hell, I'll make something up. We'll have fun.You won't even be here. I mean, I don't want to tell you how to do your job, but you should've killed me by now. Because I already know that your people are onto my people, which means any moment now you're going to be called out to go and deal --Ah! See?Here we go.Okay, that part worked.Now, guys, I warned you. This is where you shoot each other.Okay, here's where we improvise.Damn!You don't understand. He's got a pound of C-5 in that briefcase.Not that I don't believe you, but how exactly do you know all this?What do you think he looks like?Definitely. With black hair.We'll know him when we see him, that's for sure.Aw, shit.We have to split up!I'll take the mezzanine.Charlie! Charlie!I'll look for the bomb!Alright, Dylan, all we have to do is figure out which wire to cut.Oh, shit.Chartreuse and magenta. This has gotta be it.It's gonna blow anyway, once the clock gets to zero.Yeah, I fall for assholes, and you ARE one.Charlie, no. NO!He's trying to say something.Hey, wait a second. If Bosley's here... then where's Charlie?Any chance you'll be joining us, Charlie?To Charlie.

NATALIE.raw_line: And thanks to you, too, Bos.I thought you were dead.I thought the police might be here. Or your neighbors. Or your parents, here to identify your remains.I saw your car was here, so I knew you weren't carjacked and brutally beaten, left to die on the highway.Hello. Absolutely. I'll be right in.But you can understand why I thought so. You missed our date last night. You didn't call or anything. I was just sitting there by myself.I can tolerate a lot, but punctuality and attendance, those rank very high in my list of dating priorities.Just once, I want to date a normal man, without a wife, or a drug addiction, or bondage issues.I'm sorry, Bosley. I only made enough for three.He's cute.Any ransom?Any chance you can join us, Charlie?Can you not drive my car so fast, Dyl? I'm trying to type.Here's Corwin's itinerary.Hold that thought.Uh, hello? Expensive equipment.Check this out. New program I just got from a friend in the Bureau. We take that footage from the kidnapping...... isolate the part of the suspect's face that's revealed, then retriangulate his bone structure...... and voila! We've got a composite.Keppler-Wilson.Anytime.Anytime, day or night, I am... excited ... to be handing out champagne.I'm working.He's a bartender. I need dependable. I need reliable. I need a Volvo man.Miss! Miss! I'd love some champagne.What are you reading?That's the new Michio Kazura. That's not even out in America.Hello? Warriors of the Broken Earth? Classic.Tomuru nasgawa ishi Tokyo sen!I'm Natalie.Listen, there's an animation festival at the Egyptian this week. I was wondering if you might want to...I'll meet you there.I'm on it.Vegetarian spring roll?Two guns. One ankle, one shoulder.You take point. I'll circle behind.That way.There are times I wish we carried guns.Hey! Hands off, assh....Okay, to summarize? Damn.No, it wasn't.I've seen this before, he's scrambling his calls through a secondary location.We need to tap this phone line at the source, THEN we'll know where his calls were coming from.Bos, can we check a directory?Hey look! Mechanical bull.Mind if I try?Guten Morgen!Okay, new problem.Thoughts, suggestions, points to consider?There is no right.If it goes down the mountain, that's all I need.Oh God, no.I have a date with Pete. Right now."Gee, sorry Pete. I had to rescue a billionaire."I'll sound like a flake. I can't stand flakes.You think?Say, Fiji?Sounds like a plan.BACK WHERE AH'M FROM, WE RACE IN SWAMPS AND BACK ROADS! THIS ALL'S A PIECE A CAKE!I nicked him. Should give you enough time to do the deed.So you install a transmitter.Patch in directly to the relay, broadcast on a high frequency. That way, you can have access to the mainframe from the comfort of your own home. And they have no idea that you can peek inside.Only the two directors can disengage the fail-safe. We have to get their keys.Uh oh, lemme guess. You're off to chase bikinis at some tropical resort?Have to go. Plans tonight.Hey Dylan, can we talk to you for a second?There's something going on between you and Knox. Isn't there?Uh, yeah Dylan, it IS. He's a client.What? She doesn't have ANY point, Alex, I can't believe you're siding with her.You know Charlie would NEVER approve of this.Thanks for the second chance. I swear, I'm really not a flake.I bet there's a dozen women here who fit that description.Really.Ladies room. I'll be back in two minutes.Who do you work for?Speak now or never again.National Security Agency? You're with the NSA?I'm so sorry, but I have to go. I can't explain. This is my cell phone number. Please call me tomorrow. Please. I'm sorry.Dylan, we were set up. Vivian Wu is not who she says she is. She's a former assassin and an all around bitch.What?!I'm ten minutes away. Wait until I get there.Dylan...Who knew that we are actually tapping into the main servers for The National Security Agency?Wait a minute. We installed the transmitter, yes, but we never gave him the receiver.That laptop was the only way to access the transmitter. And we gave the laptop to...I don't even want to think about what I'm thinking right now.Not off a boosted signal. We'd have to be within 20 miles.Hear that? That's a blue spotted egret. They only live in one place.Nice work, Dyl.Bosley's close.BOSLEY! Bosley, can you hear me?How do I get up to you?Hello?... Pete, hi! How are you?I did. I do. I mean, thank you for calling.Can you hold on a sec?One more sec.Sorry about that.No. Not at all.You know, work this week has been really busy. It's been hard to focus.See, the thing is, I'm not a full- time waitress. I should have been more up-front about that, it's just...Everything's fine!You bitch! I like that guy.Do you have any idea how difficult it is to find a quality man in Los Angeles?I can handle villainy. I can even handle super-villainy. But what you did is just wrong.Hi, Bos!Don't worry, we'll get him.But Bosley, you HATE sports, why would you... You didn't buy them for yourself.I always saw him as younger.No, silver hair. And tan.He's outside a lot.How hard can it be to spot Charlie?I got the floor.Charlie?Roger that, Alex, I'll stop the clock!Give us the detonator.Bosley! Are you okay?

ALEX.raw_line: We couldn't have redirected the flight path without your help.If it's on Charlie, we will.If you don't defuse this bomb, Logan, L.A.'s going to be a new underwater attraction.Which wire? The red one or the blue one?So the red one.You saved the world again, Logan.Let's have it rewritten.Hello?Not sure. Whenever I can. I'll call you.A very good one.Charlie's not very social.Charlie needs me.My hero.What? I've got a great relationship.That way, he doesn't ask about my work.So what's the catch?Charlie, where do we start?Kidnap the founder and you sink the company.This is a transmitter. I'll be able to hear everything you say.Try to get Corwin to talk about the industry, Knox, anything.I know. You'll do great.You're carrying a lot of tension along ze fourth und fifth vertebrae. Let me see if I can vork it out.The human body is an amazing instrument. Just by activating ze right energy points, you can improve ze circulation, alleviate pain, or...... knock a man unconscious.You must have dozed off.Oh yeah. He'll be easy to spot with that open head wound.Don't bother. I know where it is. I used to spend every winter there.That looks like our target.I'm gonna need a distraction.Where's Knox?The calvary. Giddy up.Sorry. Wrong room. Back! Run!Good news: I found Knox.Bad news: I found company.They're coming after us.It's a bobsled run.Hard left! HARD LEFT!HARD RIGHT!Hard left!We're at the bottom!We couldn't have done it without you, Bos.Any special guy you were thinking of inviting?Consider it done.Even if we do get inside, there won't be time to search for it. There's got to be a hundred terabytes of information there. It could take days.Red Star has a lot of Government contracts, so security is tight. Key- card badges throughout. Redundant security at all red-line areas with biometric scanners and weekly keycodes. Pervasive video surveillance, lasers, air-displacement sensors. Plus a hard- wired fail-safe at the relay to prevent exactly this kind of tapping.Then we have to get back into Red Star. Problem is, their biometric sensors are too good.It's done. Red Star's mainframe is open for business.Me too.She's got a point.I'm not siding with anyone, but technically, he is no longer...Oh come on, Charlie wouldn't care. I think you're just being overly cautious.Me too.Got me.We'll get you some sedatives. You'll be fine.Come with you?Jason, I don't...It's my job, Jason. I can't explain it, but I have to be on call, all the time, and...Gunfire! Get down!My God, you're hit. You're...Sorry about that, I...Nice, Alex. Real nice.Hey, is someone firing more squibs or...He played us from the very start. It was all just so he could get us to tap into Red Star. He couldn't figure out a way to do it himself.What?Come on, Bosley, answer. I've tried all his numbers and paged him five times. No answer.Come on, Bosley. Tell us where you are.Bingo.Florida.You heard the man.You find him. I'll get Dylan.The question is, where's he headed?You bought them for...Sixty, tall, well-built.He's not George Hamilton.IF we see him.I'll take the luxury boxes.Charlie!? Charles Townsend!Jason? Shit.Charles Townsend? Anybody, Charles Townsend?Jason, hi, I...Can I talk to you later?I'm sorry, I...Jason, please...Jason, get down!Right now, just by leaning forward, I could crush your windpipe. You'd die a slow and painful death. You don't want that, do you?Where is the bomb, when's it going off?Hi, Jason. Gimme one second?Angels! Knox planted the bomb in the basement, and it's timed to go off when the game clock hits zero!I lied to you Jason. I'm not a secretary.And that wasn't Charlie.I'm actually here to stop a madman from killing everyone in this building. Would it be okay if we talked later?You're kidding me.Give it up, Knox. You're surrounded.
